metadata.title: CVE-2024-7055 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in FFmpeg up to 7.0.1. It has been classified ascritical. This affects the function pnm_decode_frame in the library/libavcodec/pnmdec.c. The manipulation leads to heap-based buffer overflow.It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has beendisclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 7.0.2 is ableto address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-273651.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
